name: Don't display to user
description: If true, indicates that the containing group or question should not be displayed to the user for data entry.

element.formal: If true, indicates that the containing group or question should not be displayed to the user for data entry.
element.comments: Some questionnaires may have questions that represent calculated values or internal "fixed" metadata.  These elements need to be included with the answers, but should not be displayed to the user.
